Name: Hornitos Lau
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
FINE STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
CHURN and add more crushed ice so the cocktail fills the glass.
Review: Jaspar recommends making a batch in their glasses and refreezing them with the straws already in the glass, like the old colonels and their julep freezers in Kentucky.
History: Created in 2005 by Jaspar Eyears at Bar Tiki in Mexico City, Mexico.
